short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find single citations using the context menu.
short.fr: Trouver une référence bibliographique en utilisant le menu contextuel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***Unofficial Crossref Search***

Adds a new right-click (command-click for Mac) context menu option to search for a highlighted bibliographic reference. A new browser tab is opened when the reference is found. Behind the scenes, the search is executed using Crossref's search service, http://search.crossref.org. Code: https://github.com/GlobalNamesArchitecture/biblio-chrome
long.fr: Adds a new right-click (command-click for Mac) context menu option to search for a highlighted bibliographic reference. A new browser tab is opened when the reference is found. Behind the scenes, the search is executed using CrossRef's search service, http://search.crossref.org. Code: https://github.com/GlobalNamesArchitecture/biblio-chrome
